lines.text: My computer's got 64K of RAM right now, which is okay for two floppies. But I wanna get a hard drive. So, I'm gonna upgrade to 256K RAM. Then, I'll be talking major megabytes. I can increase my memory or network.
So what you really wanna do is ram your hard drive into a mainframe.
Do I ever!
I just wanted to get to know you better, that's all.
Nice try, Andrew, but now is not the right moment.
Well, I suppose watching my videotape of monkeys fucking is totally out of the question?
You got a moment? I need some muscle to move a bed.
I don't suppose you'd like to go to the movies tonight?
Oh, fuck off.
Well, I guess a blow job would really be out of the question then?
Not necessarily.
Oh, yeah? So do you like, what, swallow it or spit it out, you know?
Fuck you!

Fuck me? Well, that's kinda what I had in mind. You know, which way do you like it? Because I got the People's Almanac and it lists the six most favorite, popular positions with women, especially women like you. I can tell, because you have that kind of body.
Have you been with a woman?
Yes.
Hey, what are you smiling about? Had a piece of tail for breakfast?
Chew tobacca, chew tobacca, chew tobacca, spit! If you're not from Ramsey, you're not worth shit!
[Looking at dozens of joints tied together]
What is this?
That's a grass skirt.
